lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon will join Fox as an analyst in 2016, teaming with Mike Joy and Darrell Waltrip in a three-man booth.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Auto Racing; Gordon to Be Fox Analyst Next Year

snippet: Jeff Gordon will join Fox as an analyst in 2016, teaming with Mike Joy and Darrell Waltrip in a three-man booth.
abstract: Racecar driver Jeff Gordon strikes deal with Fox Sports to be studio analyst in 2016.
